name: Bee Hero (theC0der70)
description:
This is an idle game about bees.  You can completely design your own bees by customizing their abilities and cosmetics.  These bees will collect honey for you allowing you to create more bees and customize further.

Bees are endangered and they are disappearing at a fast rate. They pollinate 1/3 of all the food we eat.  Bees are a keystone species meaning many other animals rely on them, including us, in some ways.

Click on the link, and it will take you to the Bee Conservancy, a nonprofit organization dedicated to helping bees.

This is the link
